title: Boosting oxygen evolution with electrodes composed of metal sulfides and hydrogen bonded organic frameworks
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00541D, Paper
Hina Naz, Rai Nauman Ali, Waqar Ahmad Qureshi, Amjad Ali, Nyaaba Akeno Albert, Guoxing Zhu
Metal sulfides and HOFs are synthesized through a MTC approach, offering enhanced electrocatalytic performance, with a remarkably low overpotential and a Tafel slope.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
